entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
